sense.gloss: study of classical Japanese literature and culture
provincial school (established under the ritsuryō system for educating children of district governors)
school (of a provincial capital during the Xia, Shang and Zhou dynasties)

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓はある↑外|国↑↓がいこく↓↑学|生↑↓がくせい↓と↑親↑↓した↓しくなった。
sdata.e: I made friends with a student from abroad.

sdata.j: これは↑全|国↑↓ぜんこく↓↑学|校↑↓がっこう↓↑図書館↑↓としょかん↓↑協議↑↓きょうぎ↓↑会↑↓かい↓↑選定↑↓せんてい↓↑図書↑↓としょ↓です。
sdata.e: This book was selected by the National School Library Association.
